titleStmt.title: A delicate new ditty composed vpon the posie of a ring being, I fancy none but thee alone sent as a Newyeeres gift by a louer to his sweet-heart. To the tune of Dulcina.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed [by Eliz. Allde?] for F. C[oules].,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication and publisher's name from STC.
Verse - "Thou who art so sweet a creature,"
In two parts, printed side by side; part two has title: "The second part. Or, the Maidens kind reply. To the same tune.
Reproduction of original in the Pepysian Library, Magdalene College, Cambridge.
